Category: Top‑level grouping (Customer & Support, Marketing & Sales, Business Systems, Industry Solutions, Growth Systems).
Description: Short value proposition and scope of the service.
Target Audiences: Primary buyer/user segments this service targets.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps: Exact step‑by‑step instructions to configure the service inside SuiteDash.
Integrations/Tools: External tools/platforms used and how they connect (BOS bundle).

Description: Unified funnel from awareness → referral with automated handoffs.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Map funnel stages to CRM/segments.
2. Implement multi‑channel lead capture & tagging.
3. Automate nurturing and MQL→SQL transitions.
4. Trigger onboarding on ‘Won’ deals; upsell sequences.
5. Referral capture & attribution; KPI dashboard.

Description: Company‑wide SuiteDash implementation as single source of truth.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Configure core modules (CRM, Projects, Billing, Portal).
2. Model org structure with roles/circles/workspaces.
3. Migrate data; standardize templates & SOPs.
4. Cross‑dept automations for handoffs.
5. Train teams; iterate quarterly.

Description: Rapid ‘mini‑BOS’: CRM, Portal, and basic billing in days.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Requirements blitz; prioritize must‑haves.
2. Spin up simplified CRM pipeline & tasks.
3. Brand client portal; publish core pages.
4. Enable invoicing & payment gateway.
5. Record a 1‑hour team onboarding video.
